scripts.build-js-lib: ngzip jquery.min.js > ../data/jquery.min.js.gz & ngzip jquery.touchSwipe.min.js > ../data/jquery.touchSwipe.min.js.gz & node-minify --compressor babel-minify --input bajaxloader.js --output ../data/ajaxloader.js & ngzip ../data/ajaxloader.js > ../data/ajaxloader.js.gz & ngzip bootstrap.min.js > ../data/bootstrap.min.js.gz & ngzip export-data.js > ../data/export-data.js.gz & ngzip exporting.js > ../data/exporting.js.gz & ngzip highstock.js > ../data/highstock.js.gz & node-minify --compressor babel-minify --input bdialog.js --output ../data/dialog.js & ngzip ../data/dialog.js > ../data/dialog.js.gz & node-minify --compressor babel-minify --input jscolor.js --output ../data/jscolor.js & ngzip ../data/jscolor.js > ../data/jscolor.js.gz & ngzip jquery.debounce.js > ../data/jquery.debounce.js.gz
scripts.build-htm: html-minifier index.htm --output ../data/index.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier distillation.htm --output ../data/distillation.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier reflux.htm --output ../data/reflux.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier mashing.htm --output ../data/mashing.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier brewing.htm --output ../data/brewing.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier pid.htm --output ../data/pid.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments & html-minifier sensors.htm --output ../data/sensors.htm --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments
scripts.build-copy: copyfiles ajaxloader.js bootstrap.min.js dialog.js export-data.js exporting.js highstock.js jquery.debounce.js jquery.min.js jquery.touchSwipe.min.js jscolor.js scripts.js distillation.htm index.htm mashing.htm pid.htm reflux.htm sensors.htm *.css *.jpg *.png *.ico *.mp3 *.ogg ../data_uncompressed
scripts.build-lib: npm run build-babel-lib && npm run build-js-lib && npm run build-del-lib
scripts.build-babel-lib: babel ajaxloader.js --out-file bajaxloader.js --presets=es2015 & babel dialog.js --out-file bdialog.js --presets=es2015
scripts.build: npm run build-babel && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-htm && npm run build-del && npm run build-copy
